events.message: I am filing a claim due to a car collision that occurred yesterday evening at an intersection.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following the report of a vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to handle the investigation and processing of the vehicle accident claim.
Your claim for the car accident has been acknowledged; our team is now reviewing the details.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and your driver's license for claim processing.
All requested documents including photos and the official police report have been uploaded successfully.
Investigation into the circumstances of the vehicle collision has commenced with the information received.
The investigation has concluded confirming the damage extent and liability in the auto accident.
A settlement offer has been prepared based on the investigation results and damage evaluation.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the prompt communication.
The claim has been officially approved for payment following customer agreement to the settlement terms.
Payment corresponding to the approved settlement amount has been successfully processed and issued.
The claim file is now closed after completion of payment and confirmation from the customer.
